about_the_game:
Play as Barbie and Barbie as you work together with friends and family to complete challenges and quests to help the community.



Get ready for the ultimate Barbie™ gaming adventure as Barbie and Barbie work together to save a beloved Malibu landmark, the Malibu Waves Community Center! The once thriving destination is nearly abandoned and on the verge of being closed. It’s time to band together to restore the beloved community center to its former glory.




Discover up to 6 new spaces and help restore the beloved community center.



Play as Barbie and Barbie as you team up with their BFFs and family to save the day! Put your own stamp on the Malibu landmark by combining talents and creativity to transform six spaces including the Animal Care Center, Campsite, Crafting Studio, and more!




Complete tasks in the Pet Salon, Skate Park, Tech Lab and more.






Collect community points and use them to unlock awesome outfits and items to upgrade the Malibu Waves Community Center.



Use the power of friendship to complete fun quests and puzzles and unlock exciting minigames! You’ll earn rewards to customize Barbie with new outfits and accessories, or upgrade spaces with exclusive paints, furnishings, and décor. It’s going to take teamwork to turn around the Malibu Waves Community Center and make a difference.




Play solo or team-up in local co-op.



It’s a Barbie game like no other! Try new things with friends and family, like caring for pets with Barbie’s sisters, making ice cream with Ken, renovating the arcade with Teresa, customizing scooters with Nikki, or performing a new song with Daisy as your DJ... and what Barbie adventure would be complete without an epic musical finale? Everyone will want to help Barbie and Barbie restore the community center and have a lot of fun along the way.


  • PLAY AS BARBIE – Play as Barbie and Barbie as you work together with friends and family to complete challenges and quests to help the community.
  • EXPLORE MALIBU – Discover up to 6 new spaces and help restore the beloved community center.
  • TRY FUN ACTIVITIES – Complete tasks in the Pet Salon, Skate Park, Tech Lab and more.
  • EARN REWARDS – Collect community points and use them to unlock awesome outfits and items to upgrade the Malibu Waves Community Center.
  • TEAM UP IN MINIGAMES – Play solo or team-up in local co-op.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 / Intel Core i3-7100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 550 / Nvidia GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2500X / Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 280 / Nvidia GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

short_description: Join Barbie™ on a fun summer adventure to save the Malibu Waves Community Center! Help friends, unlock minigames and earn points for upgrades while you restore a beloved landmark.
